TestDescription.name: JBoss web service console
TestDescription.Description: JBoss web service console is enabled on this server. All supported stacks provide a web console for getting the list of the endpoints currently deployed on a given host as well as basic metrics regarding invocations to them. The console is available at http://localhost:8080/jbossws/services assuming your application server is currently bound to localhost:8080.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can list all the registered service endpoints and possibly use this information to conduct further attacks.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Restrict access to the JBoss web service console.
